projects.title: Dialyse Centrum Groningen | New Workplace Environment
projects.description:
First part of the project consisted of migrating the hosted environment to a flexible platform at UniServer. During this phase servers where upgraded preparing for the next phase.

The next phase was the build of a new workplace environment with Microsoft 365 components where possible and keeping the hosted "on-premises" servers where needed.

projects.title: Nooteboom Trailers | Uitbesteding ICT
projects.description:
Takeover management of the As-Is workplace environment (clients, servers).
Migrate from on premises Exchange to Exchange Online and phase out old archiving solution.
Build an new Citrix environment for 'standard' office workers and  'performance' AutoCAD designers on HPE Moonshot platform in out datacentre.
Migrate connected servers to a VMWare platform next to the HPE Moonshot.
Manage new clients (Windows desktop and laptop, Android and iOS smartphones) with Intune.

projects.title: Pensioenfonds Metaal en Techniek |  Uitbesteding ICT
projects.description:
Managing the migration of the PMT employees to Microsoft Office 365, delivering new notebooks and re-configuring their tablets and smartphones, all managed by Intune. The technical transition is a major part of that, but more important is the adoption of the Open and Secure Cloud way of working by the employees of PMT. This after being used to logging in to a Citrix environment fo so many years.
Adoption continues after the technical migration. Microsoft Teams is a big part of their new way of working.
During this project several other projects and changes emerged, like the moving the PMT Office from Rijswijk to The Hague. These were all handled wihin this team.

projects.title: Please Payroll | Software-defined Datacenter
projects.description:
Implementation of a hyperconverged software-defined datacenter based on VMware vSAN as a software-defined storage-platform (SDS) and VMware NSX as a software-defined networking-platform, built on a ESXi cluster and fallback cluster in a second datacenter.
Products used: Dell EMC server, storage and networking, VMware vSphere, vSAN, NSX, vRealise en Horizon, Commvault platform for backup, archiving, deduplication and compresison and Zerto for snapshot replication, failover/fallback disaster recovery, NSX integrated Fortinet Fortigate-VMX firewalls
